item.title: How to install setlock on Debian?
item.dc:creator: Gustavo
item.description: That’s the only question Google and IRC don’t answer – but after this post Google will. About two hours wasted to find out the freaking stupid solution: aptitude install daemontools-installer build-daemontools And hit ENTER for every question.
